Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Muthetept(i), chantress of Amun with painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with black eyes, a black collar, crossed arms in relief with a black bracelet and holding two black hoes, the front of the leg section is inscribed with three rows of black painted hieroglyphs, the back is decorated with a representation of a diagonally slung black seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev G H Fagan
